about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the dark adventure of a guy who suffers from depression and feels guilty. He never takes off his hood and always keeps his hands in his pockets. Michael became disillusioned with life and decided to try to start his life over. To do this, he left the metropolis and a successful career, sold the house he inherited, and moved to the other side of the country to forget the mistakes made in the past. But is it possible to escape from your past?

Unravel the sinister secrets of your neighbors to find the truth hidden by the veil of darkness, and also help Michael get rid of guilt, overcome depression and start a new, happy life.


  • Enjoy this exciting and intense story through the eyes of Michael, a young man haunted by nightmares
  • Help Michael get rid of guilt, overcome depression and start a new happy life
  • Explore, interact with your surroundings... and come face to face with your fears.
  • A Horror Fiction Adventure that gradually plunges into an atmosphere of fear, nightmare and despair
  • Influence the intriguing plot with your actions
  • Interact with good neighbors and beware of dangerous ones
  • Solve a variety of puzzles and play mini-games
  • Choose who is your friend and who is your enemy by the branched dialogues
  • Secrets, stories and tasks that are invisible at first glance entail different consequences
  • Atmospheric sound effects and original melodies
  • Colorful 2D graphics, at first glance creates the impression of a sweet and peaceful life in a beautiful remote town. But only at first glance...

In this adventure game, you will interact with Michael's life. In addition to the obvious plot, you can find many hidden details, secrets and tasks that will reveal the plot more, tell neighborly secrets and help Michael cope with his past, which haunts him. But to reveal the whole plot completely, you will have to be attentive and seriously invoke a bit of head-scratching
